about_the_game:
Gnome Online is an innovative, fast-paced real-time PvP sandbox MMORPG. You are called upon to form guilds and fight for supremacy in the seamless, zone-free, and unstable open fantasy world of Gnome Online. Recruit and train new warriors, conquer fortresses and guild cities, and participate in epic battles with hundreds of players to build and defend powerful realms.

Core Features

A Sandbox PvP MMORPG
Engage in real-time skirmishes or massive battles, build, defend, and conquer realms in the largest seamless, persistent world without zones, instances, or artificial barriers. Forge your legend as a fierce fighter, shrewd politician, wealthy merchant, or masterful craftsman. The possibilities are endless.

Seamless, zone-free, exciting world
Experience the largest and most beautiful handcrafted world of its kind in a seamless real-time environment, not divided into stages. Travel and explore a continent and countless small islands on foot, on horseback, by ship, or by magical means. Encounter hundreds of monsters equipped with superior AI. Dynamic shadows and visual effects, a realistic day/night cycle, a vast color palette, ambient sounds, and music delight the senses and provide a unique gaming experience. The ability to use the environment to your advantage makes knowledge of the terrain a crucial factor in evading enemies or staging attacks, giving explorers a serious tactical advantage.

Uniqueness and depth of skills and custom roles
Forget levels; with Gnome Online's progression system, you can improve your chosen skills at your own pace while playing the game your way. The selection of skills is entirely up to you. In the "Character Creation" window, you can choose 11 random "school skills," with only one being the "ultimate skill" of any school. All "general skills" are available to all players. You can activate and combine countless skills, both general and school skills, for any set build.

Combat: Individual player skills and teamwork
Combat takes place in real-time and at a fast pace, with manual targeting. Your skills are important, while teamwork, strategy, and tactics make the difference. The combination of top-down isometric view combat, epic battles, and sieges with RPG-style strategy is the recipe for a truly epic, exciting, and adrenaline-pumping experience.

Create and conquer realms
Huge sieges and clan wars bring the chaos of massive battles to life. Control of territory is exerted by taking over cities and hamlets, conquering nearby villages, and defending them against your enemies. Form strong alliances, experience the politics and diplomacy of war, defend your allies, betray them, be betrayed, and seek revenge.

The importance of craftsmanship
From the simplest sword and shield to the elusive dragon armor, all items in Gnome Online are player-made. War and the comprehensive loot system ensure a constant need for equipment of all kinds, creating a thriving economy that makes master craftsmen one of the most sought-after professions in any clan or team.

This is an indie game
We at H-Production are committed to developing the most fun, innovative, and best PvP MMORPG on the market. For us, the game begins at launch. Throughout the entire lifecycle of the game, we continuously develop and renew it, inspired by player feedback. You are not just playing a game but taking part in its development.

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel I3 550 or better
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960 or equivalant
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5000 MB available space
